snippet: The Mets’ David Wright has a fractured right pinkie finger and is questionable for the weekend series in Philadelphia.
abstract: New York Mets third baseman David Wright, who fractured his right pinkie finger, can play in upcoming series against Philadelphia Phillies if he can tolerate the discomfort.
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ David Wright has a fractured right pinkie finger and is questionable for the weekend series in Philadelphia.

headline.seo: Mets’ Wright Can Play if He Can Take the Pain
headline.main: Wright Can Play if He Can Take the Pain
headline.print_headline: Wright Can Play if He Can Take the Pain
